title: Billie on Therefore I Am (Spotify Commentary)
lyrics:
[Spoken Word]
"Therefore I Am"... [laughs] it's funny, I've recently seen people talk about who they think it's about and I'm like "what are you talking about?" It's actually not about anybody I know, it's not about anybody that I've ever had a friendship or a relationship with, it's about people, types of people, and... yeah, I don't know, it's like, I'm not really gonna talk about what it's actually about, 
but
 it's just a fun one. It's just like a "don't take me seriously" song [laughs].
